full_text: Visiting NYM 5267.06F July 17, 2009 Attachment C Metropolitan Correctional Center - New York Daily Atty. Room / Visiting Room Inventory Date: 07/21/19 Inmate Name Number Unit Officer Time In Time Out Property 1Epstein 76318-054 2A 9:00 none The only authorized items allowed in the attorney / visiting room are a plain wedding band (without any type of stone), a religious medal (not to exceed a value of $100.00), and legal papers when necessary. i.e. co-defendant meeting. This form will be turned in daily to the Lieutenants Office upon the closing of the attorney / visiting room. After review, the Operations Lieutenant will forward to the Captain's secretary to retain on file for 30 days. Date: Time: E/W Operations Signature: 000492 Sensitive But Unclassified DOJ-OGR-00024654

text_blocks.content: Attachment C Metropolitan Correctional Center - New York Daily Atty. Room / Visiting Room Inventory
Inmate Name Number Unit Officer Time In Time Out Property

The only authorized items allowed in the attorney / visiting room are a plain wedding band (without any type of stone), a religious medal (not to exceed a value of $100.00), and legal papers when necessary. i.e. co-defendant meeting. This form will be turned in daily to the Lieutenants Office upon the closing of the attorney / visiting room. After review, the Operations Lieutenant will forward to the Captain's secretary to retain on file for 30 days.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a handwritten form. The image quality is good, and the text is legible. There are no visible redactions or damage.
